reviewText: This was definitely worth the money spent I would highly recommend it
a "peach" video; covers get me a lot --won't order another peach again!

Club Erotique is a DVD video of various girls posing and stripping. The video is very closely done in the style of Penthouse Magazine Video. The video has 8 different scenes covering just under an hour. (About 5-7 minutes per scene or girl) Some of the girls in this DVD are also famous models that have also appeared in either Penthouse Magazine, or from various adult web sites. Such models include Crissy Moran, Anita Dark, and Lux Kassidy, just to name some of the models in the video.

The DVD contains the movie, photo slideshow, and trailers for other "Peach Entertainment" or "Red Dragon Releasing" videos available wherever adult videos are sold.

Overall it's a nice DVD and good quality video. Personally I don't recommend paying more than $15 for this DVD as it's only just under 1 hour long. (0:58:03) FOR ADULTS ONLY!!!

This dvd tries to make it sound like it has a story but it doesn't.  I got it because Crissy Moran is in it.  She never disapoints me.  The other women are pretty and show you all there is.  It is not as explicit as some shows but is pretty explicit.
its like a broken rercord there all the same movies you buy one you seen them all not great but not terrible

Lots of Nudity but nothing special.  Samantha Ryan is in three scenes and she only looks ok.  That is like almost half the film and she has no real attractiveness.  It does have Crissy Moran in a schoolgirl like garb and it is fun with her lollipop (more so without though).  Lux Kassidy is good here also she is wearing red and black which I think goes well on a hot blonde woman.  Anita Dark seems like she may be aging her makeup is just off almost like her head is squeezed.  VV is just ok here not as good as tastes like a peach.

I hesitate to give any production with this much explicit nudity (and there is a lot of it here) any less than three stars, but the pacing is so poor that I feel that I have no other choice. Three strikes: Poor pacing (I found myself fast forwarding; the stripping sequences ran far too long with too much mugging for the camera and the same poses over and over); poor stripping (if any of these girls really are, or were, dancers, you'd never know it--they move as if they're posing for still photos instead of dancing for an audience); and overall, poor talent (with the exception of Anita Dark).

Five girls in all, all of them take everything off and show you themselves entirely. This release is as explicit as anything that Peach has on the market and again, it SHOULD have been a winner. It just fails to be up to the level of Peach's best--and easily is outdone by the sequel,"Club Erotique 2" (which for some reason I can't seem to link to at the moment). If you're going to get only one, get that one!
